abstract: actress salma hayek : ` harvey weinstein is my monster too '
article: new york - mexican actress salma hayek said she was a victim of sexual harassment by hollywood mogul harvey weinstein in an op-ed in the new york times on wednesday . `` harvey weinstein was my monster too , '' the 51-year-old wrote , and described dozens of instances where he tried to force her into sexual contact and reacted to her refusal with anger and violent threats , once even threatening to kill her , hayek wrote . hayek wrote that she kept quiet about weinstein 's treatment of her for years and decided to come forward after numerous women publicly spoke out against the movie producer , their accusations ranging from sexual misconduct to rape .

weinstein was fired from his own film studio and ousted from the academy of motion picture arts and sciences , the producers guild of america and the british academy of film and television arts after the allegations surfaced . he has admitted poor behaviour but denied accusations of rape . in response to dpa 's request for comment , a spokeswoman for weinstein 's lawyer said a response would be issued shortly on hayek 's accusations . police in los angeles , new york and london have launched investigations into weinstein .
